section.name: Melmoth the Outcast
section.p: You were cast out of your homeland for something that no civilized country would regard as a crime. Now you have dedicated yourself to roaming the world in search of a more tolerant people to settle among. Perhaps you will find an end to your quest in Uttaku?
You can play as Melmoth, or as a wayfarer with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
